wpPage.title: SmartExpenses for SharePoint
wpPage.content:
What is SmartExpenses for SharePoint?

SmartExpenses is an add-in for SharePoint – Office 365 that helps you report and manage your employee’s expenses in your organization. It is built on top of the hugely popular Sharepoint 2013, 2016 and Sharepoint Online. Highlighting some awesome features such as: create and manage your employee’s expenses reports and export them to CSV File, define approvers or set your approval workflow (Multiple steps) and much more. Join us and give your feedback.  For more information, please contact us using the following form here. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
